sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Report Maps list

Map objects define the different levels that users can drill down into on a map report and the data displayed on these levels. Admins can create and manage these objects. This list contains all the maps in your instance.

Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.

Click New to create a new report map.

The Report Maps list has the following columns:
  • Key – Shows the ISO 3166 code for countries and their subdivisions. Click the value in the key to edit the map object.
  • Name – The name of the map object
  • Level – Indicates the subdivision of the map object. Level 1 is World. Level 2 can indicate a continent, a region, or a country.
  • Parent – The map object one level up from the selected object.The parent-child relationships define drill levels in a map hierarchy.
  • Geographical map – Boolean value. Non-geographical maps include objects such as floor plans.
  • Active – Indicates if a map object is active in your instance. If false, the map unavailable when creating map reports.
Related information
Create a map
sys_embedded_help_content.name: sys_report_map_list-normal
